title: üõ†Ô∏è How to Configure Thrustmaster TWCS Throttle for MSFS 2024: Step-by-Step Guide! üöÄ
description:
In this video, we provide a detailed, step-by-step guide on how to configure the Thrustmaster TWCS Throttle for Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 (MSFS 2024). The default configuration is almost unusable, so follow along as we show you how to set up your controller for the best flight simulation experience. Whether you're a seasoned pilot or new to the flight sim community, this tutorial will help you get the most out of your Thrustmaster TWCS Throttle. Don't miss out on optimizing your setup and enhancing your flight sim adventures!

00:00 - Intro
00:18 - Intro video
00:27 - Explanation of different controller options
01:07 - Creating new profiles
11:46 - Testing the configuration
16:59 - Outro

If you are looking for steps how to configure the quadrant, check this video:
